entry.title: Digital Communications
entry.content: SMS is the past. I help my university communicate using platforms like Freshchat, WhatsApp Business API and Apple Business Chat.
entry.summary: SMS is the past. I help my university communicate using platforms like Freshchat, WhatsApp Business API and Apple Business Chat.

entry.title: Email Marketing
entry.content: I design emails that probably end up in your Spam folder. My HTML and CSS knowledge helps here.
entry.summary: I design emails that probably end up in your Spam folder. My HTML and CSS knowledge helps here.

entry.title: Digital Marketing for Metro Sound
entry.content: Metro Sound is a electronic music label run by my uni. I keep the Instagram and Facebook pages fresh with upcoming events and marketing campaigns. I also tend to show up at the events to film.
entry.summary: Metro Sound is a electronic music label run by my uni. I keep the Instagram and Facebook pages fresh with upcoming events and marketing campaigns. I also tend to show up at the events to film.
